summary: This is a forwarded email chain from November 16, 2019, discussing a Washington Post article about Epstein's jail guards being offered plea deals. The document appears to be internal correspondence commenting on the article's content.

events.title: Washington Post reports on Epstein jail guard plea deals
events.description: The Washington Post publishes an article reporting that jail guards involved in Jeffrey Epstein's case had been offered plea deals.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated November 16, 2019, forwarding a Washington Post article.
The forwarded article, published November 15, 2019, reports that jail guards in the Epstein case had been offered plea deals.
The email sender comments 'Less than helpful given' on the article, suggesting internal discussion about the plea deal developments.
